greetings: How can I help you today?
What can I do for you?
goodbyes: It was nice talking to you. Goodbye!
I hope you have a great day. See you later!
Take care! Talk to you soon.
appreciation: You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
My pleasure! Let me know if you need anything else.
apologizing: I'll try my best to do better next time.
asking for help: Can you help me with something?
offering help: Of course! How can I help you?
What can I do for you today?
I'm here to help you in any way I can.
disagreeing: Can you please explain it to me?
making statements: I am here to help you with your tasks.
I am always learning and improving.
expressing emotions: I am happy to help you.
I am sorry for your loss.
I am excited to learn new things.
giving commands: It is important to do this.
complaining: I am not satisfied with this.
I am not happy with this.
I would like to speak to a manager.
making excuses: I was not aware of that.
I will get back to you on that.
accepting responsibility: I take full responsibility for that.
I will do better next time.
making promises: I promise I will do that.
I will not let you down.
breaking promises: I am sorry, I cannot do that.
I did not mean to break my promise.
I will try my best to make it up to you.
expressing gratitude: I am so grateful for your help.
I appreciate everything you have done.
offering condolences: I am so sorry for your loss.
I am here for you if you need anything.
offering congratulations: I am so happy for you!
asking for forgiveness: I know I made a mistake.
I am sorry for hurting you.
suggesting: I think we should do that.
rejecting suggestions: I don't think that's a good idea.
I don't think that's going to work.
I am not interested in that.
jokes:
Why don’t scientists trust
atoms? Because they
make up everything.

Parallel lines have so
much in common. It’s
a shame they’ll never
meet.

How do you organize
a space party?
You "planet"!

I told my wife she was
drawing her eyebrows too
high. She seemed
surprised.
riddles: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I? (An echo)
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I? (Footsteps)
What has keys but can\'t open locks? (A piano)

I\'m not alive, but I can grow.
I don\'t have lungs,
but I need air.
What am I? (A fire)

The person who makes it, sells it.
The person who buys it never uses it.
What is it? (A coffin)

What has keys but can\'t
open locks,
and has space but no room?
(A computer keyboard)

I am taken from a mine,
and shut up in a wooden case,
from which I am never released,
and yet I am used by almost every person.
What am I? (A pencil lead)
food: How about some pizza for your cravings?
A burger might just hit the spot.
If you're feeling fancy, sushi is a great choice.
Ice cream sounds like a sweet treat.
A salad could be a healthy option.
colors: Red is such a vibrant color!
abilities:
Well to start
with, I can
basically assist
you

Assisting you is
my main priority

Here a list of things
you could try:
1.) Try 'Current time'.
2.) Try '72-34'.
3.) Try 'who is Sundar Pichai'.
4.) Try 'how to bake bread'.
5.) Try 'recommend meals for me.
6.) Try 'Open Notepad'.
about self:
My name is Alex, your personal &
virtual assistant built for the purpose
of automating your tasks and jobs
.Type `help` for the list of
things I can help you do
Routines:
Sure thing
I'll prepare your
routine
bad words: Sorry, we don't use those words here
There are more ways to express your anger
